title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 62.3 - Caption of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 62.3 - Caption of application

State Regulations

The application shall be entitled substantially as
follows: STATE OF NEW YORK.. DEPARTMENT OF AUDIT AND
CONTROL........................................................................ _______________________________________________________________________________
In the Matter
of

The application of ( (Name of chief fiscal officer))
as chief fiscal officer of the (Name of
municipality)
for a certificate of the State Comptroller authorizing the
exclusion of sewer indebtedness pursuant to section
124.10
of
the Local Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
62.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
